MajorClaims.Text: Money should spend on facilities in school or update resources, which are beneficial to school rather than just instructors
I against providing more money to professors

Claims.Text: the school should put more emphasis on students instead of professors
To improve education, spending more money to raise professors' salary is inappropriate
Students' tuition is not only for the professors but also for their quality of learning at university

Premises.Text: the schools are established for students
the most efficient way to improve the education is to guide the students to learn actively
By renewing some facilities in school so students will spend more time at school doing assignment
A comfortable environment can attract people to stay longer
students spend more time on school to make a good circulation of learning
students have a better environment to working on their assignments
the quality of their assignments will improve
the competition between peers enhances and forms a circulation
In my school, the classrooms in my university are old and kind of shabby
I prefer spending money in a coffee shop to staying at school to finish my assignment
It's unpleasant to stay at school
coffee shops are not always quiet, so my classmates and I often finish our work roughly
the ultimate purpose is to change, to motivate students to be better
High-salary instructors don't teach students harder because they earn more money
There won't be any effect if school does so
There was news about raising professors' salary in my country
This event provoked a demonstration composing of students mostly
The proposal of the demonstration was eliminating the raising salaries
if the policy of raising salary was supported, the demonstration would not happen
